name: Iterative Design: AeonCharge UI
summary: This is a project from CS1300 UIUX at Brown University. We went through the full process of mocking up a solution to a startup concept, including sketching, wireframing in Balsalmiq, and prototyping in Figma. We iteratively improved our design incorporating feedback from peer critiques and user testing.
